Question: In May 2012, this person was hired as a judge for the second season of the American version of The X Factor.
Hints: Boy band Busted also wrote a song about this person called "Britney", which was on their debut album.
Amidst media speculation, this person confirmed she was dating 'N Sync member Justin Timberlake.
In July 2004, this person became engaged to American dancer Kevin Federline, whom she had met three months before.
